name: processus/schreibmaschine
description: Logging for PHP 5.3 base on Monolog

suggest.mlehner/gelf-php: Allow sending log messages to a GrayLog2 server
suggest.ext-amqp: Allow sending log messages to an AMQP server (1.0+ required)
suggest.ext-mongo: Allow sending log messages to a MongoDB server
suggest.ext-zmq: Allow sending log messages to a ZeroMQ server
suggest.ext-memcached: Allow sending log messages to a Couchbase 2.0 server via Memcached Client
suggest.ext-couchbase: Allow sending log messages to a Couchbase 2.0 server
